text: Karl Ravech (born January 19, 1965) is an American journalist. He is a personality for ESPN as an anchor for SportsCenter and Baseball Tonight. He is the main Baseball Tonight host for ESPN."Karl Ravech". espnmediazone3.com. November 17, 2009. Retrieved October 3, 2011. He also covers college basketball and calls the Little League World Series for ABC and ESPN. He covered golf in the past. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:Major League Baseball broadcasters Category:Golf broadcasters Category:SportsCenter anchors and reporters
title: Karl Ravech
